results.content: There are 3 sections.  The first section isn't so bad.  Feels like a brief introduction into Rust, which is understandable.  However sections 2 & 3 with the fake voice over and non-interactive code reviews, where you can feel the disjointed presentation, were not effectively done.  I rarely leave reviews and I hate to give a bad review but do not buy this course.  It is not worth the money.  I hope this helps!

results.content: This is three trainings combined together. I doubt the original teachers even know about this. Hence you get three times similar material. If you like that lesson 57 begins again downloading and installing cargo then this might be your training. I like a more controlled and coherent approach.
results.content_html: This is three trainings combined together. I doubt the original teachers even know about this. Hence you get three times similar material. If you like that lesson 57 begins again downloading and installing cargo then this might be your training. I like a more controlled and coherent approach.

results.content: Unfortunately, this course has really disappointed me. Some really fundamental features of Rust like borrowing and ownership are only touched on the surface. The Option enum and it's methods are not mentioned at all. In the end, the course only gives you a rough idea of what Rust has to offer without explaining the why. Explaining borrowing & ownership within like 4 minutes is not worthy of Rust.
results.content_html: Unfortunately, this course has really disappointed me. Some really fundamental features of Rust like borrowing and ownership are only touched on the surface. The Option enum and it's methods are not mentioned at all. In the end, the course only gives you a rough idea of what Rust has to offer without explaining the why. Explaining borrowing & ownership within like 4 minutes is not worthy of Rust.

results.content: There was some good information here but it is so monotonous and seems like it is just being read from a book. This wouldn't be so bad if it was a book but the whole point of video training is to make it more interesting. Hard to power through the whole course...
results.content_html: There was some good information here but it is so monotonous and seems like it is just being read from a book. This wouldn't be so bad if it was a book but the whole point of video training is to make it more interesting. Hard to power through the whole course...

results.content: Great course content! Covers use cases of the rust programming language but it's not so easy to understand and the examples are so short, almost breezed over
results.content_html: Great course content! Covers use cases of the rust programming language but it's not so easy to understand and the examples are so short, almost breezed over

results.content: poor theoretical explanation, code not explained properly, everything done quickly. Just bad!
results.content_html: poor theoretical explanation, code not explained properly, everything done quickly. Just bad!

results.content: It is helpful, but the presentation is not optimal. Some parts are too boring. Other parts are interesting and essential, but they are covered too quickly. Still learn a lot.
